About Me

Hello! My name is David and I'm currently a Masters candidate at CMU's human-computer interaction department.
I enjoy visualizing data and building software, especially to help people think.
I like books, team sports, bakeries, and taquerias.

Portfolio

"In one chart" In One Chart

A visualization of Twitter images claiming to show things "in one chart".

Androgynous Names

A visualization of US census data showing names that have been steadily androgynous.

Methods for Point Tracking

With multiple, non-linear lines on a single graph, you can't use traditional methods in D3 for point tracking. Here, I present three methods to solve this issue.

Wikireveal

Lightweight Chrome extension to link comments on disucssion pages to the version of the article when that comment was written.
